item.title: Azure Security - Part 2
item.description: Azure Security Center Azure Security Center is a centralized security management system/dashboard that provides security related information of your Hybrid infrastructure. Azure security works in conjunction with you, the customer, which provides recommendations to you in making your environment secure. It’s the customer’s responsibility to work on these recommendations and make infrastructure secure. The security center’s remarkable feature is the recommendations tab; This view provides an overall security score and recommendations on how to increase the score.
